title: Agile-Based Open Educational Resource Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of instructional design and experience using digital educational tools
context.additional_context: A customized short-term course for corporate teacher capacity building, aiming to enhance field applicability through OER development practice in language education.

learning_goals: Learners can develop one OER prototype in language education by applying agile methodology.
Learners can design reusable OER structures according to learning design (LOUDI method) principles.
Learners can execute over three stages of the OER quality improvement process through peer review in collaborative environments.

resources: OER (Open Educational Resources) Production Guide Template

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
